name: Zentiva Group, a.s.
membership: Zentiva Group is member of Medicines for Europe.
goal: Zentiva is one of the major brands of the generics business of Sanofi group. We strive to identify and fulfill patients' needs. We are using innovation and adapted business models all over the world to make affordable, high quality generic medicines available to patients.
euInitiatives: Zentiva Group is member of Medicines for Europe.
